Appium Migration from 1.X to 2.XAbout

Notes for pytest upgrade!

Dec 21, 2021

NOTE: 在升级前，如果你已经有一个可以work的venv，请再重新建一个venv来升级，确保正常工作不受影响

从 pytest-3.6.3 升级到 pytest-6.2.5

  1. 首先遇到了allure-pytest的不兼容问题:

solution: 升级allure-pytest==2.9.45 $ pip install ‘allure-pytest==2.9.45’

  1. pytest mark warning:

solution: add a pytest.ini file under ui directory

  1. appium set capabilities error

E AttributeError: can't set attribute /Users/vicky/venv/pycharm3.9.1/lib/python3.9/site-packages/appium/webdriver/webdriver.py:140: AttributeError
